settings.text: Shipment of this product may take several days

settings.html3: The product can be bought in quantity increments of .

settings.text: Due to the size of the pallet, it may take several days to schedule shipment of this product.

NOTE: All clearance products are sold as is with no lifetime warranty. Clearance products are not eligible for free or same-day shipping and do not qualify for free prep/slip solution, unless otherwise noted. Orders containing at least one clearance product, will have shipping applied to the whole order, even non-clearance products, and are limited to the contiguous U.S. only. Discount codes cannot be applied to clearance products. Flexfilm reserves the right to cancel and refund any order. All sales are final and non-refundable. While supplies last.

settings.testimonial: "I've used most of the industry leaders. I'm with Flexfilm now"
settings.author: Terrance Garnto

settings.testimonial: "To be honest I am extremely happy since switching to Flexfilm. As an installer I think it is a very high quality product and from my customers stand point they are extremely happy with the final result too."
settings.author: Craig Haney

settings.testimonial: "Love the 30% Terraflex I used today for the first time. Metered spot on for matching the factory tint."
settings.author: Shawn Davis

settings.testimonial: "Flexfilm is the best hands down for the prices and service. You can't find anything better out there..."
settings.author: Sean Wahlberg

settings.testimonial: "This company is great to work with, and the tint works amazing!"
settings.author: Preston Raber

settings.testimonial: "I have been using your film for almost 7 years now and never had a problem."
settings.author: Zane Wilson

settings.testimonial: "Works great! Definitely a go to for me. As a newbie I have enjoyed how easy it is to work with."
settings.author: Ryan Mclane

settings.testimonial: "Been using it for 2+ years and I love it shrinks like a dream and I have never had a problem with it at all."
settings.author: Bradley Jones

settings.testimonial: "I have used it now on a few vehicles and Iâ€™m very happy with it. Definitely will be sticking with it."
